abstract: Three women who live on Grand Street use their address as the basis for a novel approach to raising funds for a charitable cause.
snippet: Three women who live on Grand Street use their address as the basis for a novel approach to raising funds for a charitable cause.
lead_paragraph: Imagine what they would have had to do if they lived, say, a mile away, in the 400 block of Grand Street. Pay attention to the number 400.

headline.main: When It Comes to Charity, Their Address Says It All
